name: Dropbox Social Impact Projects
tagline: Lend your skills to projects with social impact
body:
## Hey Dropbox, thanks
Thanks for taking time to work on some important civic engagement and social justice projects! They will impact the city of Cleveland, Ohio and in the future, whatever city would like to replicate the projects. Your time is appreciated above measure.

***

## Clarity
These projects came out of the FIX 216 Hackathon and we've had a couple follow up meetings since the event to make sure all information is up-to-date and organized. If anything is unclear or if you have a question, ask us! seth@hackcleveland.org


***
_Projects are in order of priority_ 

## Project Title
Meeting/Issue Alert
## How You Can Contribute
Build data scraper to get information out of PDFs
## Project Location
[Live Example](https://www.citygram.nyc/)
[Code for America-Github](https://github.com/codeforamerica/citygram)

***
## Project Title
Government Meeting Minute Analysis
## How You Can Contribute
Mine data in order to expand current data set from all of Cuyahoga County to City of Cleveland so users can filter results by city
## Project Location
[Cuyahoga Meeting Minutes Statistics-Github](https://github.com/Buckeyes216/fix216)

***
## Project Title
Permanent Record API
## How You Can Contribute
Create a landing page that links to the open source project and provides content that explains to city leadership the meaning and value of using APIs
## Project Location
[Interactions-Github](https://github.com/PermanentRecord-Fix216)
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
